name: Send Instagram Direct Messages via KlickTipp
description:
This automation allows you to automatically send personalized Instagram Direct Messages through KlickTipp — helping you engage with your audience in real time.

You’ll need the Instagram ID of the contact (for example, obtained through a comment interaction or similar engagement). You can use other scenarios to collect and enrich contact data in KlickTipp automatically, such as:

www.make.com/en/integration/17208-instagram-lead-magnet-automation?templatePublicId=17208

www.make.com/en/integration/17237-jotform-instagram-smart-lead-enrichment-for-subscription-in-klicktipp?templatePublicId=17237

Once the contact data is in place, this template helps you build direct, meaningful connections through Instagram messages — perfect for welcoming new followers, thanking engaged users, or nurturing leads with a personal touch.

Ideal for:

Businesses looking to combine Instagram engagement with marketing automation

Coaches, creators, and brands that want to build stronger customer relationships

Teams using KlickTipp to centralize and automate communication workflows
